subject: testing exceptions.
msgSnippet: Hello! I am testing a method that throws different exceptions. Til the moment i use one testXXX method for each exception, but i would like to know if there is
messageBody:
Hello!
I am testing a method that throws different exceptions.
Til the moment i use one testXXX method for each exception, but i
would like to know if there is a way to test all the different
exceptions in one test method.
The problem is that if one of the exceptions fails ( no exception is
thrown) the other situations are not tested.
Is there any way to do it; some way of collect the results and make
the test at the end?? Other ideas?
Thanks in advanced!
Natalia
